description.value:
• Cost: 1
  • Effect: Make opposed [[/check skill=deception]] (Charisma + Deception vs target's Empathy + Wisdom)
  • Success: Your next attack against that target this turn has Fortune
  • Notes:
    • Only works against creatures that can see and understand you
    • Subject to Multiple Action Penalty

system.effect:
Make opposed Deception check (Charisma + Deception vs target's Empathy + Wisdom)
- **Success:** Your next attack against that target this turn has Fortune
- **Notes:**
  - Only works against creatures that can see and understand you
  - Subject to Multiple Action Penalty
